bike.description: Monocoque High Modulus C7+ carbon with custom weave carbon strands and aero shaped tubes, Internal cable routing, EST (extended seat tube), Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XXS (48cm), XS (50cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (60cm)

components.description: High Modulus C7+ carbon aero stays w/ BC (brake cavity) design, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger
FC-440 Fuji Carbon  Aero Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer  w/Internal routing
FSA Gossamer Pro MegaExo w/ Integrated Spindle, 7075 CNC 39/53T Chainring
NEW Fuji PGC Aero 43mm Alloy, 700c clincher
Cane Creek  1 1/8" Integrated Road w/Convex hollow alloy 25mm spacer
Profile Design T2+ Alloy Clip On
